function.name: getToolsForDepartment
function.description: Get the information, from the body input text, to retrieve the tools for a certain department

function.name: getProductCategories
function.description: Get the avaliable categories of products

function.name: getProductsAlmacen
function.description: Get information for a product from the body of the input text

function.name: getHighStockProducts
function.description: Get information for display high stock products from the body of the input text

quantity.description: quantity of the product to be showed. Max 20 products.

function.name: getLowStockProducts
function.description: Get information for display low stock products from the body of the input text

quantity.description: quantity of the product to be showed. Max 20 products.

function.name: getNoStockProducts
function.description: Get information for zero or non-existing stock products in a category from the body of the input text

function.name: getCostumer
function.description: Get information for a costumer from the body of the input text

function.name: getSupplier
function.description: Get information for a supplier or provider from the body of the input text

function.name: getOrder
function.description: Get information for an Order from the body of the input text

custumer.description: name of the custumer of the Order

function.name: getProductMovement
function.description: Get information for a Product Movement from the body of the input text

function.name: getSupplyInventory
function.description: Get information for an Inventory of supplies from the body of the input text

name.description: name of the supply for the inventory

id.description: id of the supply for the inventory
